caption.title: Intracellular localization of NSs in Vero-E6 cells infected with rMP12 or rMP12 variants encoding NSs variants with interface residue mutations (muT1, muT3, muT4).
caption.p: Cells were fixed 24 h p.i. and co-stained with either anti-N or anti-NSs antibodies (green) as indicated and DAPI (blue).

caption.title: 1D 1 hr NMR spectra of NSs-ΔNΔC and interface mutation variants.
caption.p: Asterisks indicate distinct high-field shifted methyl resonances with conserved chemical shifts in all variants.
